snippet.title: Adversity Andy - Gameplay Trailer (Ludwig Jam)
snippet.description:
https://fatsheep.itch.io/adversity-andy
I made this Foddian game in approximately two days for Ludwig and Ottomated's game jam! In it you play as a frog who has to jump his way to the top of a massive spiraling tower. I will warn you, the game is hard.

Art, programming, animation, sound and design by (me) Knut "Fatsheep" Steffenrem
Featuring wonderful music made by the amazing AnchorlightForge!

The last half of the development of this game was streamed on my twitch! You can check the VOD here:
https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1189106965

Follow me on:
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/KnutAnimations
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/fatsheep__
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KnutSteffenrem
ArtStation: https://www.artstation.com/knutsteffenrem

#KnutAnimation #AdversityAndy #LudwigJam
